verses.verse: And Ahab <S%H256><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Elijah <S%H452><s%> had done, <S%H6213><s%> and withal <S%H3605><s%> how <S%H834><s%> he had slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then Jezebel <S%H348><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> So <S%H3541><s%> let the gods <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me, and more <S%H3254><s%> also, <S%H3541><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> I make <S%H7760><s%> not <S%H853><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%> as the life <S%H5315><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them by tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time. <S%H6256><s%>

And when he saw <S%H7200><s%> that, he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H413><s%> his life, <S%H5315><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Beer-sheba, <S%H884><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belongeth to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and left <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

But he himself <S%H1931><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> and sat down <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> a <S%H259><s%> juniper tree: <S%H7574><s%> and he requested <S%H7592><s%> <S%H853><s%> for himself <S%H5315><s%> that he might die; <S%H4191><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> It is enough; <S%H7227><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> take away <S%H3947><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am not <S%H3808><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than my fathers. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%>

And as he lay <S%H7901><s%> and slept <S%H3462><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> a <S%H259><s%> juniper tree, <S%H7574><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> then <S%H2088><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Arise <S%H6965><s%> and eat. <S%H398><s%>

And he looked, <S%H5027><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was a cake <S%H5692><s%> baked on the coals, <S%H7529><s%> and a cruse <S%H6835><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at his head. <S%H4763><s%> And he did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and laid him down <S%H7901><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came again <S%H7725><s%> the second time, <S%H8145><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Arise <S%H6965><s%> and eat; <S%H398><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the journey <S%H1870><s%> is too great <S%H7227><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> thee.

And he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> in the strength <S%H3581><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> meat <S%H396><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Horeb <S%H2722><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And he came <S%H935><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> a cave, <S%H4631><s%> and lodged <S%H3885><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came to <S%H413><s%> him, and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What <S%H4100><s%> doest thou here, <S%H6311><s%> Elijah? <S%H452><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I have been very jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H7065><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> thy covenant, <S%H1285><s%> thrown down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine altars, <S%H4196><s%> and slain <S%H2026><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and I, <S%H589><s%> even I only, <S%H905><s%> am left; <S%H3498><s%> and they seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> my life, <S%H5315><s%> to take it away. <S%H3947><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> upon the mount <S%H2022><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> passed by, <S%H5674><s%> and a great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H2389><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> rent <S%H6561><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and broke in pieces <S%H7665><s%> the rocks <S%H5553><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> in the wind: <S%H7307><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> an earthquake; <S%H7494><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> in the earthquake: <S%H7494><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> a fire; <S%H784><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> in the fire: <S%H784><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> a still <S%H1827><s%> small <S%H1851><s%> voice. <S%H6963><s%>

And it was <S%H1961><s%> so, when Elijah <S%H452><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, that he wrapped <S%H3874><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> in his mantle, <S%H155><s%> and went out, <S%H3318><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entering in <S%H6607><s%> of the cave. <S%H4631><s%> And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came a voice <S%H6963><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> doest thou here, <S%H6311><s%> Elijah? <S%H452><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I have been very jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H7065><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> thy covenant, <S%H1285><s%> thrown down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine altars, <S%H4196><s%> and slain <S%H2026><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and I, <S%H589><s%> even I only, <S%H905><s%> am left; <S%H3498><s%> and they seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> my life, <S%H5315><s%> to take it away. <S%H3947><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Go, <S%H1980><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> on thy way <S%H1870><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Damascus: <S%H1834><s%> and when thou comest, <S%H935><s%> anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hazael <S%H2371><s%> to be king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Syria: <S%H758><s%>

And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nimshi <S%H5250><s%> shalt thou anoint <S%H4886><s%> to be king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and Elisha <S%H477><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> of Abel-meholah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H65><s%> shalt thou anoint <S%H4886><s%> to be prophet <S%H5030><s%> in thy room. <S%H8478><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that him that escapeth <S%H4422><s%> the sword <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2719><s%> of Hazael <S%H2371><s%> shall Jehu <S%H3058><s%> slay: <S%H4191><s%> and him that escapeth <S%H4422><s%> from the sword <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2719><s%> of Jehu <S%H3058><s%> shall Elisha <S%H477><s%> slay. <S%H4191><s%>

Yet I have left <S%H7604><s%> me seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the knees <S%H1290><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> bowed <S%H3766><s%> unto Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> him.

So he departed <S%H1980><s%> thence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> Elisha <S%H477><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphat, <S%H8202><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was plowing <S%H2790><s%> with twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen before <S%H6440><s%> him, and he <S%H1931><s%> with the twelfth: <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> and Elijah <S%H452><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H413><s%> him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> his mantle <S%H155><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> him.

And he left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Let me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> kiss <S%H5401><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> and my mother, <S%H517><s%> and then I will follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> thee. And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Go <S%H1980><s%> back again: <S%H7725><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> to thee?

And he returned back <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> him, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and slew <S%H2076><s%> them, and boiled <S%H1310><s%> their flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they did eat. <S%H398><s%> Then he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> and ministered <S%H8334><s%> unto him.
